description: |-
  The `anytrue` function returns `true` if any element of a collection
  is `true` or `"true"`. Learn how to use the `anytrue` function in Packer templates.
---

# `anytrue` Function

`anytrue` returns `true` if any element in a given collection is `true`
or `"true"`. It also returns `false` if the collection is empty.

```hcl
anytrue(list)
```

## Examples

```command
> anytrue(["true"])
true
> anytrue([true])
true
> anytrue([true, false])
true
> anytrue([])
false
```
